languages.text: {n}Соломон тяжело дышит, зажимая рану в груди. Он не смотрит на вас — его внимание поглощено Глейто. Железные пальцы гладят окровавленного, еле живого кибермастифа по спине, на лице застыло выражение безысходности.{/n}

{n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон тяжело дышит, зажимая рану в груди. Он не смотрит на вас — его внимание поглощено Глейто. Железные пальцы гладят окровавленного, еле живого кибермастифа по спине, на лице застыло выражение безысходности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

{n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

{n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

{n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

{n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

{n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne atmet schwer und bedeckt eine Wunde an seiner Brust. Er sieht dich nicht an ... seine ganze Aufmerksamkeit gilt Glaito. Seine metallenen Finger streichen sanft über den blutigen, halb toten Cyber-Mastiff. Sein Gesicht ist zu einer Maske aus Verzweiflung erstarrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne atmet schwer und bedeckt eine Wunde an seiner Brust. Er sieht dich nicht an ... seine ganze Aufmerksamkeit gilt Glaito. Seine metallenen Finger streichen sanft über den blutigen, halb toten Cyber-Mastiff. Sein Gesicht ist zu einer Maske aus Verzweiflung erstarrt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le souffle court, Solomorne se tient les côtes là où il a été blessé. Il ne vous regarde pas, car toute son attention se concentre sur Glaito. Le désespoir se lit sur son visage tandis que ses doigts de métal touchent délicatement l'échine du cyber-mastiff ensanglanté dont la vie ne tient plus qu'à un fil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le souffle court, Solomorne se tient les côtes là où il a été blessé. Il ne vous regarde pas, car toute son attention se concentre sur Glaito. Le désespoir se lit sur son visage tandis que ses doigts de métal touchent délicatement l'échine du cyber-mastiff ensanglanté dont la vie ne tient plus qu'à un fil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙喘着粗气，紧紧捂着胸口处的伤口。他没有看你，所有注意力都集中在格雷托身上。他的金属手指小心翼翼地触碰着浑身是血、奄奄一息的格雷托，抚摸着它的后背，脸上满是绝望之色。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙喘着粗气，紧紧捂着胸口处的伤口。他没有看你，所有注意力都集中在格雷托身上。他的金属手指小心翼翼地触碰着浑身是血、奄奄一息的格雷托，抚摸着它的后背，脸上满是绝望之色。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne respira profundamente, sujetando una herida en su pecho. No te mira, solo tiene ojos para Glaito. Sus dedos metálicos recorren desesperados la espalda del maltrecho cibermastín, que se aferra a su vida. Su cara es el vivo retrato de la desesperación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne respira profundamente, sujetando una herida en su pecho. No te mira, solo tiene ojos para Glaito. Sus dedos metálicos recorren desesperados la espalda del maltrecho cibermastín, que se aferra a su vida. Su cara es el vivo retrato de la desesperación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは胸の傷を押さえながら、苦しげに息をしている。彼の視線はあなたには向けられていない。その注意は、グライトに注がれていた。金属の指が、血まみれでかろうじて息をしているサイバーマスチフの背にそっと触れる。彼の顔には、深い絶望の色が凍りついたまま浮かんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは胸の傷を押さえながら、苦しげに息をしている。彼の視線はあなたには向けられていない。その注意は、グライトに注がれていた。金属の指が、血まみれでかろうじて息をしているサイバーマスチフの背にそっと触れる。彼の顔には、深い絶望の色が凍りついたまま浮かんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir elini göğsündeki yaraya sımsıkı bastıran Solomorne'un ciğerlerinden ağır soluklar yükseliyor. Sana dönüp bakmıyor bile. Gözleri pür dikkat Glaito'ya kilitlenmiş. Metal parmaklarını, incitmekten korkarcasına ve şefkatli bir edayla kan revan içinde can çekişen siber mastifin sırtına değdiriyor. Solomorne'un suratında çaresizliğin buz gibi bir ifadesini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is breathing heavily, clutching a wound in his chest. He is not looking at you — his attention is focused on Glaito. His metal fingers gingerly touch the back of the bloodied, barely alive cyber-mastiff, his face frozen in an expression of despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir elini göğsündeki yaraya sımsıkı bastırmış Solomorne'un ciğerlerinden ağır soluklar yükseliyor. Sana dönüp bakmıyor bile. Gözleri pür dikkat Glaito'ya kilitlenmiş. Metal parmaklarıyla, incitmekten korkarcasına ve şefkatli bir edayla kan revan içinde can çekişen siber mastifin sırtına dokunuyor. Solomorne'un suratına çaresizliğin buz gibi bir ifadesi yerleşmiş.{/n}
